item.description:
Join us on October 9th when we will be joined by Herb Silverman, author of Candidate Without a Prayer, An Autobiography of a Jewish Atheist in the Bible Belt

Herb is the president of the Secular Coalition for America and is a hero of the secular community.  He has been at the forefront of the battles against the Religious Right for over 30 years and successfully challenged the government of South Carolina's rule that atheists couldn't hold office in his bid for governor.  It should be a informative and entertaining evening.

As always, we will be setting up around 6:30, so feel free to come and socialize. The program is scheduled to start at 7.  We ask that non members make a small $5 donation at the door.

Please watch this page for changes.
item.name: Herb Silverman, author of "Candidate without a Prayer"
